item.description:
Par 3, 9-hole course for beginners in Lexington MA. Let's meet outside the Pro Shop at 11:00am.

Here's their website: http://www.stonemeado.... Cost: $12 per person. If we have more than 10 people in this event, we can probably use the frequent golfer card, in which case it will be $7.5 per person. In addition, I'll collect $1 from everyone for the meetup website fee.

They have a good though busy driving range. You can come early and practice.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Beginner Golfer - Sunday 11AM - Lexington MA
